title: Heart-Shaped Double-Walled Glass Tea Cup or Coffee Mug in Red Gift Package -8.5 oz(240ml)
features: Gift-packaged Cup: Heart-Shaped Coffee, Tea, or cocktail Cup, made of Borosilicate glass. The ribbon is included in the box.

Double-walled: Heat-Resistance and Heat Insulation: The glass mug withstands high temperature water or drinks, no cracking when filling hot drinks in the mug just taken out of refridgerator. And due to the doubled wall, it can keep the temperature of cold or hot drinks longer time than nomal glass. More Comforatble to hold hot coffee.
Life Aesthetics : Unique creative heart shape, Enjoy the feeling of passion!
Warm-Hearted Glass- Love with every sip! These delightful cups will make you smile each time you fill them up
description: Exquisite gift for Valentines's Day. Also a gift for friends, wedding, anniveraries,family or work mates .  Materials: Food-Grade Glass  Volume: 8oz or 240ml .Temerature withstanding: -30°C to 150°C.
